hero.description: For small and medium businesses: we quickly design and launch a website, app, and bot that optimize work and increase productivity.

services.title: Full cycle of digital product development

items.title: Websites
items.desc: Corporate sites, landings and online stores with modern design and fast loading

items.title: Apps
items.desc: Mobile and web applications for iOS, Android and browsers with intuitive interface

items.title: Chatbots
items.desc: Smart bots for Telegram, WhatsApp and other platforms for communication automation

advantages.title: Five reasons to work with us

items.title: Fast development
items.desc: Launch MVP in 2-4 weeks. Agile approach allows us to adapt quickly to changes.

items.title: Transparent communication
items.desc: Daily updates, access to task tracker and direct contact with the development team.

items.title: Quality guarantee
items.desc: Testing at every stage, code review and 3 months of free support.

items.title: Expertise
items.desc: Over 100 successful projects. Deep understanding of various business industries.

items.title: Reliable team
items.desc: Close-knit team of senior specialists with experience in major projects.

items.title: Who we are for
items.desc:
• Small and medium businesses
• Startups at the MVP stage
• Companies that need to quickly launch and test a solution
• Those who want to automate processes, not just a "beautiful site"

items.title: Who we are not for
items.desc:
• Corporations with long tenders and complex bureaucracy
• Projects without a clear budget and deadlines
• Those who only need design "for the sake of form"

steps.title: Consultation
steps.desc: Discussing your idea, goals and requirements. Forming the product vision.

steps.title: Analytics
steps.desc: Market, competitor and target audience research. Preparing technical tasks.

steps.title: Design
steps.desc: Creating prototypes and UI design. Approving every screen.

steps.title: Development
steps.desc: Writing clean code, performing code reviews and testing.

steps.title: Launch
steps.desc: Deploying the project, setting up analytics and monitoring.

steps.title: Support
steps.desc: Developing the product, adding new features and optimizing.

items.quote: The team exceeded all our expectations. The project was completed on time, and the result exceeded our KPI by 200%.
items.author: Alexey Petrov

items.quote: Professional approach to every detail. Excellent communication and readiness to cooperate. Highly recommend!
items.author: Maria Ivanova

items.quote: Third project with this team. Always quality, always on time. Reliable partners for long-term cooperation.
items.author: Dmitry Kozlov

cta.title: Ready to discuss
cta.subtitle: Answer a few questions — we will show you an estimated cost and timeline. No obligations.

step1.question: What of you want to do?
step1.subtitle: You can select "not sure" — we will help define the format.

step2.question: What is the project for?
step2.subtitle: Choose the main task — we will clarify details later.

step3.question: Approximate scale
step3.subtitle: If you are in doubt, choose the medium option.

step4.question: Budget
step4.subtitle: Budget helps us understand your expectations and offer the best option.

step5.question: Timeline
step5.subtitle: Urgent projects require a dedicated team.

step6.question: Contact
step6.name: Name
step6.ctaTitle: Leave your contact — we will clarify details and suggest the optimal implementation option.

result.title: Calculation Result
result.disclaimer: The estimate is based on your answers and reflects a typical scope of work for similar projects.

itpark.title: IT Park Uzbekistan Resident
itpark.desc: In Time is an official resident of the Technological Park of Software Products and Information Technologies (IT Park). This confirms our status as a reliable IT partner, meeting international standards of quality and business transparency.

footer.desc: We create digital products that help businesses grow
